string.name: game_rules
string.b: Rules of the game: there will be three figures in front you, two below and one above, two of them will contain numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the two lower figures be equal to the number in the top figure, for this you need to insert the missing number.\n\nExample: in the upper circle is the number 7,in one of the lower circles there is a question mark, Ð°nd in another number 4. So in place of the question mark should be the number 3 because 3 + 4 = 7

resources.string: Percentage of correct answers %s from %s necessary
